analyze.buttonDisabled: Select an emotion bubble that resonates with you the most right now
analyze.aiPrompt: I am feeling {emotions}. What does this emotion mean and how can I understand it better?
analyze.aiPromptMultiple: I am feeling a combination of {emotions}. How do these emotions relate and what might this mean?
analyze.aiWarning: This will search for general information online. Results are not a substitute for professional support.

modal.title: Analysis result
modal.noCombinations: No combinations found from your selections

reflection.followUp: Would you like to explore further?

crisis.message: It sounds like you may be going through a difficult time. You don't have to go through it alone.
crisis.disclaimer: If you are in immediate danger, please call emergency services.

disclaimer.title: About this app
disclaimer.text: This app supports emotional self-awareness. It is not a diagnostic tool and does not replace professional mental health support. If you are experiencing distress, please reach out to a qualified professional.
disclaimer.label: Disclaimer

somatic.guidedStart: Take a breath. Notice your body.
somatic.guidedPrompt: What do you notice in your {region}?
